title: Smart Pill Dispenser — STM32-Based Medication Management System
desc: A smart pill dispenser that automatically releases the correct medication at scheduled times using an STM32 microcontroller, sensors, and a servo-based mechanism.
tech: STM32, Embedded C++, RFID, RTC, IR Sensor, PIR Sensor, Servo Motor, OLED Display, Keypad, Interrupts, Hardware Debugging
imageAlt: Smart pill dispenser prototype with STM32 and pill slots

title: IoT-Based Supermarket Self-Checkout System
desc: A team-based supermarket self-checkout system that combines a Raspberry Pi–powered kiosk with a full web application, allowing customers to scan items, manage their cart, and complete payment in-store or online.
tech: Python Backend, SQL / MariaDB, Raspberry Pi, Docker, Container Orchestration, REST APIs, Web Application Development, IoT Hardware Integration, System Monitoring & Troubleshooting
imageAlt: Supermarket self-checkout kiosk built with Raspberry Pi and web interface

title: Self-Navigating Soil Tiller Robot — Arduino-Based Field Prototype
desc: A self-navigating soil tiller robot on a 4WD Arduino platform that follows a line, measures soil and environmental conditions with multiple sensors, and displays live readings to the user.
tech: Arduino (C/C++), Soil Moisture Sensor, Humidity/Temperature Sensor, IR Line Sensors, Ultrasonic Sensor, 4WD Robotics Platform, Circuit Wiring & Testing, Embedded Debugging
imageAlt: Self-navigating soil tiller robot prototype on 4WD chassis

title: StockPulse – Stock Trading & Market Analysis Platform
desc: A multi-page stock trading simulation web app with dashboards, stock detail views, watchlists, and history pages, focused on smooth navigation, clear layouts, and responsive interactions.
tech: Front-End Development, UI/UX Design, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Web Application Layout, Interaction Design, Basic SQL / MariaDB Integration, Team Collaboration
imageAlt: StockPulse stock trading simulation dashboard interface

title: Trash Segregator — IoT Waste Monitoring & Sorting Prototype
desc: An Arduino-based smart trash segregator that uses ultrasonic sensors and a laser–light sensor pair to distinguish transparent plastic from general waste, monitor bin fill levels, and send live data to a ThingSpeak dashboard for remote tracking.
tech: Arduino (C/C++), Ultrasonic Sensors, Laser + Light Sensor Pair for Material Detection, Servo Motor, Custom PCB / Shield, ThingSpeak IoT Cloud, HTTP API Integration, Serial Debugging, Circuit Wiring & Testing
imageAlt: Trash segregator prototype with Arduino shield, ultrasonic modules, and ThingSpeak dashboard on laptop

title: SP Pal — Social Media App for Singapore Polytechnic Students
role: Mobile UI Developer, UX Designer & System Flow
desc: A mobile social platform designed for Singapore Polytechnic students that centralizes campus announcements, events, CCAs, lost-and-found posts, and peer interactions in one dedicated app.
tech: Mobile Front-End Development, UI/UX Design, Navigation & Screen Flows, Post & Comment Interfaces, Notification & Feed Layouts, Integration with Backend APIs (no direct DB handling)
imageAlt: SP Pal social media app interface for Singapore Polytechnic students
